description: This file defines REST API endpoints for managing events within a system, including creating, listing, retrieving, updating, deleting events, RSVPing to events, and listing user-attended events. It utilizes FastAPI for web routing, SQLAlchemy ORM for database interactions, and includes role-based access controls. The code appears to serve as the core API interface for event management within a broader application.

methods.name: create_event( event_in: EventCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
methods.description: Creates a new event and returns the created event details.

methods.name: list_events( db: Session = Depends(get_db), org_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Organization ID"), upcoming_only: Optional[bool] = Query(False, description="Only include upcoming events"), attendee_user_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="List only events user RSVP'd to"), )
methods.description: Retrieves a list of events, with optional filters for organization, upcoming events, and RSVP status.

methods.name: get_event(event_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific event by ID.

methods.name: update_event( event_id: int, event_in: EventCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
delete_event( event_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
rsvp_event( event_id: int, status: str = Body(..., embed=True, description="RSVP status: going, maybe, not_going"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Allows a user to RSVP to an event with statuses: going, maybe, not_going.

methods.name: events_user_rsvp( user_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Lists all events a specified user has RSVP'd to.

ctags.name: create_event
ctags.signature: ( event_in: EventCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )

ctags.name: delete_event
ctags.signature: ( event_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )

ctags.name: list_events
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), org_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Organization ID"), upcoming_only: Optional[bool] = Query(False, description="Only include upcoming events"), attendee_user_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="List only events user RSVP'd to"), )

ctags.name: rsvp_event
ctags.signature: ( event_id: int, status: str = Body(..., embed=True, description="RSVP status: going, maybe, not_going"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.signature: ( event_id: int, event_in: EventCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
